website_summaries.verdict: A great oversized option for the beach that has plenty of space for towels.
pros: The very large bag is made of sturdy waterproof material and can collapse flat for storage purposes
The bag has a hook for keys and a lot of exterior pockets for storing things like sunscreen or water bottles
cons: Carrying strap is not comfortable, lacks padding

customer_reviews.title: Roomy enough to carry all the things I need for work.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to carry multiple things for work. It has all kinds of pockets on the outside and the sides stay up while you are putting things in the main area of the bag, unlike the one it replaced. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Large durable multi-use bag!
customer_reviews.text: This beach bag is definitely heavy duty. The material is very durable and seems like it will last a long time! It has a slight odor to it but nothing terribly bad. It is quite large and perfect for what I need it for. Do note that the straps for this bag are very rough and may irritate the skin if carrying for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: CruiseReady10

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Big and roomy for gym and very sturdy. Second time I bought this because first one was stolen. All the compartments on outside make it easy to locate smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Marylisa Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice size bag
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and sturdy. Was able to fit a lot of stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Pool Side Referral
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a little smaller than I'd hoped, forcing me to pack it carefully when the 4 of us are going to the pool, we ARE able to take only the one bag and not be overly worried about wet toys, towels, etc. One of the other parents at the baby pool even asked where I'd gotten mine since he'd like to upgrade to something similar! All in all, I'm mostly pleased with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organization
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Lots of pockets and stands up on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Poms

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Tote
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy mesh bag for the beach. Constructed well and made out of quality thick mesh. I don't see too much sand getting into this bag despite it being made of mesh. One drawback is that overall it's a bit heavy would have preferred it to be lighter.
customer_reviews.author: MonikaAD

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Does have a lot of space and pockets. Sturdy material. Did well not holding sand.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and great for carrying wet items.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I was able to carry my beach towel and swimsuits and other items all in one bag. It's very roomy and the mesh helps with ur wet items.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It is huge and holds all 3 of our beach towels, swim suits and more. It also has so many pockets! Very convenient and has recieved numerous compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: so it's not that great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big, but it's also heavier mesh. It's not heavy to carry (by itself), but the thicker mesh makes it hard to fold up. It doesn't get compact, so it's not that great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has one and I really liked it, so I ordered one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has one and I really liked it, so I ordered one. I love it too. It has lots of pockets and can carry so much. Easy to clean and store. And the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Best beach bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This bag was so nice to have because of the size, fabric, and compartments to keep us organized. A family of five could fit multiple types of sunscreen, squirt bottles, beach blankets and towels, water bottles and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: I heart amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sandy beaches and the multiple pockets are nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sandy beaches and the multiple pockets are nice. The straps are sturdy, but the material of the straps is not forgiving on a sunburn!
customer_reviews.author: Ronica H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach bag.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight plastic-coated mesh. Seams are very strong, expect to use this for many years. Ample pockets wide enough for sunscreen and water bottles. The interior of the bag holds more than 6 beach towels rolled up. Sand falls right out. Honestly, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to take to the beach! Loved all the compartments🥰
customer_reviews.author: Susette

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE BEACH
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR THE BEACH!!!!! Lots of room for shoes, large towels, etc, and fits perfectly on your shoulder, not too bulky either!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love this beach bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second one for our summer camp! So many pockets to fit everything you need. Sand sifts right out of the mesh. Perfect beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: cindyrella

customer_reviews.title: I've used it several times and loved it. Holds 6 towels plus much more
customer_reviews.text: Family of 6. I've used it several times and loved it. Holds 6 towels plus much more. Very sturdy. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach or pool bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction, large side pockets for lotion, sunscreen, water bottles.... Holds 6-8 large beach towels. Glad we bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Blasm12

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the river
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag all the time. It is great for the river, beach...where ever. Holds a lot of items, sand and dirt falls through...lots of pockets for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for for Scuba
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built mesh bag, sturdier than it looks in the picture, that i purchased to carry my regulators in when on the boat. The fact that the whole is mesh allows everything to get safely "dunked". There are several pockets just like in the picture that could hold other items for divers, not just the water bottles. If weight is a concern you need to check the specs becuase this is not a flimsey mesh, like I said, it's sturdy. You can fold up up easy for packing.. glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: L Dove

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had dividers or larger pockets inside but we use it daily for the pool. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach or pool, lots of pockets and space for towels.
customer_reviews.author: VLT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I expected based on description and other reviews
customer_reviews.author: LNR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy bag...look forward to using it at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Tote
customer_reviews.text: Large bag. Was able to fit all my beach needs in with plenty so room/pocket space.
customer_reviews.author: KJPII's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good well made , maybe add a zipper on one pocket!
customer_reviews.author: lyleandrose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying my "stuff" on the boat
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and quality. Holds everything needed in the many side pockets so each item is easily accessed. The large center section hold our towels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: So many uses....
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Great for beach,packing up for travel and even at the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: The bag was exactly what my husband was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was exactly what my husband was looking for, and it fit his use perfectly to store all his car cleaning equipment in. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super durable and has a ton of pockets to organize your belongings!
customer_reviews.author: perrka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach or pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool bag - durable, lots of space and pockets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a day at the lake or beach!
customer_reviews.author: Bucci Family

customer_reviews.title: This bag would have been perfect 30 years ago when our children were small
customer_reviews.text: This bag would have been perfect 30 years ago when our children were small. But at this point everyone carries their our stuff in their backpack beach chairs . Will look into same item if it is made smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bernett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I do water aerobics at the gym. This tote is a pleasure for sorting everything I need and is light weight as well. Workmanship is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: FLO WIENER

customer_reviews.title: seemed like a lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: seemed like a lot for the money...but the bag is very durable and perfect for lugging items back and forth to the pool
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome! It is very sturdy and I was able ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! It is very sturdy and I was able to fit everything that I needed for a day at the water park in the bag, including 3 huge over-sized towels (which i rolled up), sunscreen, phone, keys, wallet, shoes, socks, and more. Excellent product. It would also be perfect for a trip to the grocery store, as long as you don't have a full cart.
customer_reviews.author: E. Moll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Perfect for kids and pool/beach
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Perfect for kids and pool/beach. Well built and comfortable to carry. Would also make a good organizational bag for crafts, supplies etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Mesh Beach Bags and Totes - Ultra Durable X Large with Oversized Pockets, Toy Tote Bag for Beach, Picnic, Grocery (Black, No Zipper Closure)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:No Zipper ClosureAt last, sand and water flows right through its fade and mildew resistance, waterproof, washable high-grade meshed textilene material. Our best-selling super-sized mesh tote is large enough to hold most of basic gear for the beach, picnic, pool, camping, storage and more. The heavy duty mesh tote is designed to keep you organized with 8 large puffed out compartments on the exterior for quick access to ID cards, small valuables, suntan lotions and more. The inner space can hold several towels, toys and other accessories. The textilene weave material is made from vinyl-coated polyester core yarn in the warp and designed to withstands tough use even in extreme conditions. This beach tote is made to last for years!
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE SIZE - Durable, fade resistant and waterproof textilene (see thru) material with 8 large exterior compartments. The textilene weave material is made from vinyl-coated polyester core yarn in the warp and designed to withstands tough use even in extreme conditions.
Open Dimensions - exclusive of handles (inches): 16.5L x 14.5H x 7.2W ; Hose or machine wash. Quick dry
Weighs 1.5 lb. and lies flat for easy storage; Stands fully upright by itself. This heavy duty construction tote bag holds more load in this size than most totes available in marketplace.
Carabiner hook (located inside) for keys or holding sunglasses. 6 Compartments are 8 inches high; 2 compartments 8.5W x 11H inches

It will not rip off! The 9 inch high handle drop straps (polypropylene) are X stitched, Double stitched top hem, and piping stitching around exterior edges for added strength and durability. Plus extension to bottom for added load capacity. This bag will last for years! ; 12 months Manufacturer's Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
